column5: A private master bedroom with a Queen bed and a private attached bathroom on the second floor of a house. A twin size folding floor mattress is available on request. The bath has a walk in shower and the essentials. Place is in a quiet neighborhood, shopping, supermarket (Walmart, HEB, CVS) all within 4 mi radius.  No Kitchen access.  Close to Dell, Apple, Visa, others. Austin downtown is about 25 minute drive, Domain about 15 min drive. Minutes away from the train station into downtown Austin.
column8: Private Master Bedroom with attached Bathroom
